table_definition.comment: Consumption of resources (job records) by Gateways

columns.comment: Resource where the job was initiated
columns.name: resource_id

columns.comment: The type of the resource on which the jobs ran. References the resourcetype.id
columns.name: resourcetype_id

columns.comment: The state where the resource resides
columns.name: resource_state_id

columns.comment: The country where the resource resides
columns.name: resource_country_id

columns.comment: The organization where the resource resides
columns.name: resource_organization_id

columns.comment: The type of organization where the resource resides
columns.name: resource_organization_type_id

columns.comment: Resource associated with the allocation. May be a grid resource.
columns.name: allocation_resource_id

columns.comment: Person requesting resources
columns.name: person_id

columns.comment: The organization of the person requesting resources
columns.name: person_organization_id

columns.comment: The NSF status code of the person requesting resources. References person.nsfstatuscode_id
columns.name: person_nsfstatuscode_id

columns.comment: Account the job will be charged to
columns.name: account_id

columns.comment: Allocation (resource, account) that will be charged for this job
columns.name: allocation_id

columns.comment: Request record for this allocation (used for primary field of science)
columns.name: request_id

columns.comment: The field of science of the project to which the jobs belong
columns.name: fos_id

columns.comment: The PI that owns the allocation. XDMoD adds this on ingest, otherwise it is linked to a request in XDCDB. References principalinvestigator.person_id
columns.name: principalinvestigator_person_id

columns.comment: The organization of the PI that owns the allocation. References piperson.organization_id
columns.name: piperson_organization_id

columns.comment: Type of job: hpc, cloud, hpc-reservation, ...
columns.name: job_record_type_id

columns.comment: Method used to submit this job: cli, gateway, ...
columns.name: submission_venue_id

columns.comment: Resource queue where the job ran
columns.name: queue

columns.comment: Job submission time in seconds since epoch (UTC)
columns.name: submit_time_ts

columns.comment: Job start time in seconds since epoch (UTC)
columns.name: start_time_ts

columns.comment: Job completion time in seconds since epoch (UTC), may be unknown
columns.name: end_time_ts

columns.comment: Day id of the job start time in format YYYY00DDD, e.g. 201600143. This is the day in the timezone of the LOCAL database and NOT UTC!
columns.name: start_day_id

columns.comment: Day id of the job end time in format YYYY00DDD, e.g. 201600143. This is the day in the timezone of the LOCAL database and NOT UTC!
columns.name: end_day_id

columns.comment: Local resource SUs charged
columns.name: local_charge_su

columns.comment: Local resource SUs charged after SP adjustments
columns.name: adjusted_charge_su

columns.comment: XDSUs charged. Uses current resource conv factor
columns.name: local_charge_xdsu

columns.comment: XDSUs charged after SP adjustments
columns.name: adjusted_charge_xdsu

columns.comment: NUs charged. XDSU * 21.576
columns.name: local_charge_nu

columns.comment: NUs charged after SP adjustments. XDSU * 21.576
columns.name: adjusted_charge_nu

columns.comment: Factor used to normalize local SU to TG Roaming (XDSU)
columns.name: conversion_factor

columns.comment: Boolean flag 1 = job complete
columns.name: completed

columns.comment: Boolean flag 1 = job has been deleted
columns.name: is_deleted

table_definition.name: gw_job_records
